name: TheConfidentMarriagePodcast
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Once enabled just say "Alexa, give me my flash briefing" 

The Confident Marriage’s mission is to making happiness your marriage story by offering advice, support, tips and tools to help you improve your marriage no matter what your current situation is! From communication problems, parenting disagreements, sex, infidelity, emotional cheating, pornography use/addiction, drug addiction, alcoholism, intimacy and the list goes on. Lets not forget, I keep it funny and lighthearted!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
